Package nyla.solutions.commas

Class CommasServiceFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • nyla.solutions.core.patterns.servicefactory.ServiceFactory
      • nyla.solutions.commas.CommasServiceFactory
  • public class CommasServiceFactory
extends nyla.solutions.core.patterns.servicefactory.ServiceFactory
     CommasServiceFactory implements service factory to create  GEDI COMMAndS.
 Commas is short for COMMand AnnotationS. 
 It is a Command registration framework based Annotations.
 
  
 It is based on annotations. 
 All Commas Functions must be annotated by the annotation solutions.gedi.commas.annotations.Service.
 
 them with in a FUNCTION_CATALOG using annotations.
 
 
 Configuration Properties
 #Package root separate by spaces
 nyla.solutions.global.patterns.command.commas.CommasServiceFactory.packageRoots=solutions.global.patterns.command.commas package2

      • init

        public static void init()
        Given a package root, scan it to obtain the list of COMMAS annotations and process individually as a FunctionFacts fact and using it's name as the key for later access.
        Parameters:
        serviceFactory - is the store which we can refer to later on
        packageRoot - will be used as the base package to recursively scan
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException
        java.lang.InstantiationException
